answer.title: Market Potential
answer.content: Designed with the potential to be marketed as a comprehensive system for restaurants, cafes, or coffee shops, offering dynamic content management and tailored solutions for diverse business needs.

answer.title: Skill Enhancement
answer.content: Created as a hands-on project to enhance skills and proficiency in React JS development, providing valuable experience and practical insights into building modern web applications.

answer.title: Personalized Orders
answer.content: Empowering users to personalize their dining experience by creating customized orders with a variety of options including ingredients, size, and additional preferences.

answer.title: Enhanced User Experience
answer.content: Facilitating a seamless user experience with individual profiles, allowing users to rate meals, track order history, and personalize preferences.

answer.title: Customer Loyalty
answer.content: Rewarding customer loyalty with a points-based system where users earn discounts on future orders based on their purchase frequency and order value.

answer.title: Convenient Dining Experience
answer.content: Enhancing dining convenience by enabling customers to place orders directly from their table without waiter assistance. Users can add meals to their virtual basket and place orders directly to their designated table.
